## PopulatableEthersLiquity.withdrawUSDHFromStabilityPool() method

Withdraw USDH from Stability Deposit.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withdrawUSDHFromStabilityPool(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<PopulatedEthersLiquityTransaction<StabilityDepositChangeDetails>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of USDH to withdraw. |
|  overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedEthersLiquityTransaction](./lib-ethers.populatedethersliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StabilityDepositChangeDetails](./lib-base.stabilitydepositchangedetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the Stability Deposit's [collateral gain](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.collateralgain.md) and [HALAL reward](./lib-base.stabilitydeposit.halalreward.md)<!-- -->.
